Configuration.Name: Fast_L1=L2=20m_lens_med_apx12p5
Configuration.SetupScript: config.wavelength = 8.1 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 19250 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 30 config.guide = 'lens' config.apx = -98 config.bs = 4 config.beamcenterx = 92.9341 config.beamcenterz = 92.4689 config.drive()

Scattering.SetupScript: # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(51.50, 0) driveBsz(242)
